chunks.zh: 新开发的 App，永久版交个朋友 [文末免费送码]
chunks.en: Newly developed App, permanent version, let's be friends [Free codes at the end]

chunks.zh: 用它开发的 App 已经诞生并且上线，名字叫做：Smoothrase ，Smooth - Erase 的合体，意为顺滑的擦除的意思，完全用 ChatGPT 开发并且这个名字都是 ChatGPT 起的。
chunks.en: The App developed with it has been born and launched, and the name is: Smoothrase, a combination of Smooth - Erase, meaning smooth erasure, completely developed with ChatGPT and this name was also given by ChatGPT.

chunks.zh: App 的主要功能就是，通过涂抹、圈选图片中多余的物体，去除多余物体，并且较好的还原原图内容。
chunks.en: The main function of the App is to remove redundant objects by painting and selecting on the image, and to restore the original image content well.

chunks.zh: 去除照片中的路人、线条、涂鸦、水印等多种场景适应。
chunks.en: It adapts to various scenarios such as removing passers-by, lines, graffiti, and watermarks from photos.

chunks.zh: [点这里看 B 站视频介绍]( https://www.bilibili.com/video/BV1Jx4y117n9/?spm_id_from=333.337.search-card.all.click)
chunks.en: [Click here to watch the Bilibili video introduction]( https://www.bilibili.com/video/BV1Jx4y117n9/?spm_id_from=333.337.search-card.all.click)

chunks.zh: 送 10 个永久版兑换码：
如果抢不到，还有永久版半价 3 块钱的方法，进入 Smoothrase 设置页面，再进入 高级功能 页面，连续点 5 次顶部 高级功能 那四个字的标题，12345 ，一个指头点 5 次，会弹出一个输入框，输入 龙年大吉 四个字，下面永久购买按钮就会变成半价
chunks.en: If you can't get one, there's also a way to get a permanent version for half price at 3 yuan. Enter the Smoothrase settings page, then enter the Advanced Features page, tap the title of the four words Advanced Features at the top 5 times in a row: 12345, tap it 5 times with one finger, a text input box will pop up, enter the four characters 'Happy New Year' and the permanent purchase button below will become half price

chunks.zh: 白天支持了，试了一下，效果没有 opticlean 好，期待之后的优化。
chunks.en: Supported during the day, I tried it, the effect is not as good as opticlean, looking forward to future optimization.
The Oppo phone photo album comes with it, …

chunks.zh: 请问有 MacOS 版本吗
@neochen13 还只有 iPhone 和 iPad 能用，Mac 后面适配
chunks.en: @neochen13 It's only available for iPhone and iPad, Mac will be adapted later

chunks.zh: AppStore - 下面 App Tab ，滑到最下面，兑换
chunks.en: AppStore - Below App Tab, scroll to the bottom, Redeem

chunks.zh: @VIVIANSNOW AppStore - 下面 App Tab ，滑到最下面，兑换
chunks.en: @VIVIANSNOW AppStore - Below App Tab, scroll to the bottom, Redeem

chunks.zh: @InDom 这么快吗。。看评论里没发几个。。
chunks.en: @InDom So fast? There weren't many comments.
